title: AGGH!! Why does it kick us out to miss a ban?!?!
body:
In competetive play, sometimes players choose not to ban!

Secondly, how about having the icon in the toolbar light up, when it's your turn to ban.

Is it going to be 30 seconds before it's my turn to ban? 2 minutes???? I literally don't know: it's different every game; the length of time each player takes to ban, is different every single game. There should at least be more notification. 

Players are talking about pineapple pen, suddenly I look up and there's 2 seconds left for me to ban with. Trying to click on anyone: there's 0 seconds left, and I'm trying to click on the ban button: "I don't care who's in this game! Ban anyone!! I literally don't care if anyone's banned or not!!"

5 minute wait time!
I clicked on a champion! How about banning that champion, if I don't click the ban button??


"It's your duty to watch, and be prepared to ban." 
Yah, and this is a normal match: it's supposed to be more relaxed than ranked play.
In professional play, sometimes players choose not to ban!!!!!!



What a load of garbage Riot throws upon us.

replies.body: Why is this on  oce? we don een have draft pick, if you arent locking in bans, its your own fault for not paying attention for 2 minutes in  lobby.
